data.text: Awurade, me Nyankopɔn, wo mu na mede me werɛ hyɛ.
Wo so, me Nyankopɔn, na mede me ho to,
Wɔn a wɔde wɔn ho to wo so no mu biara
Kyerɛ me wʼakwan, Awurade,
Fa wo nokware no so kyerɛkyerɛ me,
Kae, Awurade, wo mmɔborɔhunu ne wo dɔ kɛse
Nkae me mmabun bere mu bɔne
Awurade ye na ɔteɛ;
Ɔde ahobrɛasefo fa ɔkwan pa so
Awurade akwan nyinaa yɛ ɔdɔ ne nokwaredi
Awurade, me bɔne so de,
Enti hena ne onipa a osuro Awurade?
Obedi yiye wɔ ne nkwanna mu,
Awurade da nʼatirimsɛm adi kyerɛ wɔn a wosuro no;
Mʼani da Awurade so daa,
Dan wʼani hwɛ me, na dom me,
Me koma mu dadwen adɔɔso;
Hwɛ me haw ne mʼahohiahia
Hwɛ sɛnea mʼatamfo adɔɔso
Bɔ me nkwa ho ban na gye me;
Ma trenee ne nokware mmɔ me ho ban,
Gye Israel, Onyankopɔn,
